en.about_me_p1: I am Vivaldo Roque, a full-stack software engineer based in Luanda, Angola.
en.about_me_p2: I fell in love with technology when I wanted to build my own tools! Since then, I've been passionate about creating apps that solve real-world problems by applying new and exciting technologies.
en.about_me_p3: My latest experience has been focused on building applications with Flutter, Dart, Java and Sqlite.
en.works1_desc: CFOP TRAINER, A TOOL TO HELP YOU LEANING AND TRAIN CFOP.
en.works1_features1: Reference table for: the 41 F2Ls, 57 OLLs, 21 PLLs, 41 COLLs and 27 WVs;
en.works1_features2: F2L, OLL, PLL, COLL and WV Trainer;
en.works2_desc: TICTACTOE GAME WITH AI USING JAVASCRIPT.
en.works3_desc: APPLICATION CAPABLE OF SOLVING THE MAGIC CUBE FROM IMAGES CAPTURED BY THE CAMERA.
en.banner_text: YOU CAN TAKE A CLOSER LOOK AT MY WORK
